'''Ariana''' is a friend of [[Tricia Hale]].

==History==
Ariana came to visit Tricia in her hospital room after she was injured. She told Tricia that she prayed about it and she'd be taken over as Cheer Captain while Tricia recovered. She also said that she called Randy and said she thinks she convinced him still to take Tricia to Homecoming even though she was injured.

==Relationships==
===Friendships===
She, [[Tricia Hale]], [[Courtney (Forever Young)|Courtney]], and [[Molly (Forever Young)|Molly]] are friends.
